bug.author: abfleishman
bug.summary: Can't create bounding box by clicking in existing box
bug.description: If you have one box that is the entire head of a person, but also want to add a new box that is an eye, you just keep selecting the existing box instead of creating a new one. It would be great to be able to start a bounding box inside of an existing box. I could see the functionality of holding shift and being able to have a new box drawn starting where you click inside an existing box instead of it only selecting the existing box as it does now.

comments.comment: Fixed with exclusive add mode in dev branch.
